attributes.description: Sample dashboard for Cisco ASA Firewall devices
attributes.panelsJSON: [{"gridData": {"w": 12, "y": 15, "h": 15, "i": "1", "x": 12}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_0", "title": "Destination Port and Transport", "embeddableConfig": {"vis": {"legendOpen": false}}, "panelIndex": "1"}, {"gridData": {"w": 12, "y": 15, "h": 15, "i": "2", "x": 0}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_1", "title": "Source Port and Transport", "embeddableConfig": {"vis": {"legendOpen": false}}, "panelIndex": "2"}, {"gridData": {"w": 24, "y": 0, "h": 15, "i": "3", "x": 0}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_2", "title": "ASA Firewall Events Over Time", "embeddableConfig": {"vis": {"legendOpen": false}}, "panelIndex": "3"}, {"gridData": {"w": 24, "y": 0, "h": 15, "i": "4", "x": 24}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_3", "title": "ASA Flows by Network Bytes", "embeddableConfig": {"vis": {"legendOpen": false}}, "panelIndex": "4"}, {"gridData": {"w": 12, "y": 15, "h": 15, "i": "5", "x": 24}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_4", "title": "Blocked by Source", "embeddableConfig": {}, "panelIndex": "5"}, {"gridData": {"w": 12, "y": 15, "h": 15, "i": "8", "x": 36}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_5", "title": "Top ACL by Blocked", "embeddableConfig": {}, "panelIndex": "8"}, {"embeddableConfig": {}, "version": "7.0.0-SNAPSHOT", "panelRefName": "panel_6", "panelIndex": "9", "gridData": {"w": 48, "y": 30, "h": 12, "i": "9", "x": 0}}]
attributes.title: [Filebeat Cisco] ASA Firewall
Destination Port and Transport [Filebeat Cisco]

attributes.title: ASA Events Over Time [Filebeat Cisco]
attributes.visState: {"type": "histogram", "title": "ASA Events Over Time [Filebeat Cisco]", "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "addTimeMarker": false, "type": "histogram", "seriesParams": [{"data": {"id": "1", "label": "Count"}, "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "type": "histogram", "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "show": "true", "showCircles": true, "mode": "stacked"}], "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "times": [], "legendPosition": "right", "categoryAxes": [{"labels": {"truncate": 100, "show": true}, "id": "CategoryAxis-1", "show": true, "style": {}, "type": "category", "scale": {"type": "linear"}, "title": {}, "position": "bottom"}], "valueAxes": [{"labels": {"filter": false, "rotate": 0, "truncate": 100, "show": true}, "id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "show": true, "style": {}, "type": "value", "scale": {"type": "linear", "mode": "normal"}, "title": {"text": "Count"}, "position": "left"}]}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "group", "id": "2", "params": {"order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucket": false, "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "field": "event.outcome", "size": 5, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing"}, "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "3", "params": {"drop_partials": false, "time_zone": "Europe/Madrid", "useNormalizedEsInterval": true, "interval": "auto", "field": "@timestamp", "min_doc_count": 1, "timeRange": {"to": "now+1y", "from": "now-15y"}, "customInterval": "2h", "extended_bounds": {}}, "type": "date_histogram"}]}

attributes.title: ASA Flows by Network Bytes [Filebeat Cisco]
attributes.visState: {"type": "histogram", "title": "ASA Flows by Network Bytes [Filebeat Cisco]", "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "addTimeMarker": false, "type": "histogram", "seriesParams": [{"data": {"id": "3", "label": "Total bytes"}, "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "type": "histogram", "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "show": true, "showCircles": true, "mode": "stacked"}], "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "times": [], "legendPosition": "right", "categoryAxes": [{"labels": {"truncate": 100, "show": true}, "id": "CategoryAxis-1", "show": true, "style": {}, "type": "category", "scale": {"type": "linear"}, "title": {}, "position": "bottom"}], "valueAxes": [{"labels": {"filter": false, "rotate": 0, "truncate": 100, "show": true}, "id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "show": true, "style": {}, "type": "value", "scale": {"type": "linear", "mode": "normal"}, "title": {"text": "Total bytes"}, "position": "left"}]}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "2", "params": {"drop_partials": false, "time_zone": "Europe/Madrid", "useNormalizedEsInterval": true, "interval": "auto", "field": "@timestamp", "min_doc_count": 1, "timeRange": {"to": "now+1y", "from": "now-15y"}, "customInterval": "2h", "extended_bounds": {}}, "type": "date_histogram"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "3", "params": {"field": "network.bytes", "customLabel": "Total bytes"}, "type": "sum"}]}

attributes.title: Top ASA Messages [Filebeat Cisco]
attributes.visState: {"type": "table", "title": "Top ASA Messages [Filebeat Cisco]", "params": {"sort": {"direction": null, "columnIndex": null}, "perPage": 10, "showPartialRows": false, "showMetricsAtAllLevels": false, "showTotal": true, "totalFunc": "sum"}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "bucket", "id": "2", "params": {"order": "desc", "orderBy": "_key", "customLabel": "ID", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucket": false, "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "field": "cisco.asa.message_id", "size": 15, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing"}, "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "3", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "4", "params": {"aggregate": "concat", "sortField": "@timestamp", "field": "log.level", "size": 1, "customLabel": "Severity", "sortOrder": "desc"}, "type": "top_hits"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {"aggregate": "concat", "sortField": "@timestamp", "field": "event.original", "size": 1, "customLabel": "Sample message", "sortOrder": "desc"}, "type": "top_hits"}]}
